definition: a division of an ocean or a large body of salt water partially enclosed by land
details:
noun
- a division of an ocean or a large body of salt water partially enclosed by land
= example: a division of an ocean or a large body of salt water partially enclosed by land
- turbulent water with swells of considerable size
= example: turbulent water with swells of considerable size
- anything apparently limitless in quantity or volume
= example: anything apparently limitless in quantity or volume
= synonyms: ocean
